definition: to prick up one's ear/to listen attentively
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to prick up one's ear and listen carefully

sentences.english: Let me hear your when I an lonely.
sentences.chinese: 讓我在孤獨時，只要傾耳，就能去聽你。

sentences.english: The music is all around us, all you have to do, is listening.
sentences.chinese: 只要傾耳聆聽，音樂便無處不在。
他以熾烈的焦急心情傾耳細聽。

sentences.english: Let me hear you when I am lonely .
sentences.chinese: 讓我在孤獨時，只要傾耳，就能去聽你。
